title: BinarySearch
text: 算法第四版_二分法###二分查找 递归/// 数组/// 开始索引 0/// 结束索引 /// 要查找的对象/// public static int BinarySearch(int[] arr, int low, int high, int key){ int mid = (low + high) / 2; if (low > high) return -1; else { if (arr[mid] == key) return mid; else if (arr[mid] > key) return BinarySearch(arr, low, mid - 1, key); else return BinarySearch(arr, mid + 1, high, key); }} ###二分查找 非递归/// 数组/// 要查找的对象public static int BinarySearch(int key,int[] arr){ int low = 0; int max = arr.Length - 1; while (low<=max) { int mid = low + (max - low) / 2; if (key arr[ mid]) low = mid + 1; else return mid; } return -1;}
